name: Ski Time 2023
description:
Ski Time 2023

This is a small game I made right when I first registered my itch.io account in early 2018. It was specifically made to be a test project for itch.io.

Now Ski Time is back, with a 2023 faithful remastered version!

Controls

WASD - Move left/right
Space - Brake

Goal

Make your way down the mountain to get back to the hotel. Try to be as quick as possible! What's going to be your best time?

Credit: Font used for banner
